<title level="1" right="Background " pfs="Limited">[Mystic Tutor](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=247)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Pervasive Magic" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=390" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 219 <sup>2.0</sup>

 

</column>

You spent years predicting, identifying, and harnessing the innate magical talents of those around you. A magic-rich world has taught you that you can never have too much training when everyone around you is capable of magic.

 Choose two ability boosts. One must be **Intelligence** or **Wisdom** and one is a free ability boost.

 Your innate magical trait is [arcane](/Traits.aspx?ID=11) or [occult](/Traits.aspx?ID=120). You're trained in either [Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2) or [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11), depending on your innate magical trait, and the [Academia Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) skill. You gain the [Recognize Spell](/Feats.aspx?ID=834) skill feat.
name: Mystic Tutor
